features.name: rg_feat_catalogue
features.description: Access to catalogue and dataset features

permissions.name: fs_file_read
permissions.description: Ability to read files from the filesystem.

permissions.name: fs_file_write
permissions.description: Ability to write or modify files in the filesystem.

permissions.name: fs_policy_write
permissions.description: Ability to write or change policies in the filesystem.

permissions.name: rg_perm_catalogue_read_org
permissions.description: Ability to view catalogue of their organization

permissions.name: rg_perm_catalogue_read_all
permissions.description: Ability to view catalogue of all organizations

permissions.name: rg_perm_catalogue_write_org
permissions.description: Ability to write in catalogues of their organization

permissions.name: rg_perm_catalogue_write_all
permissions.description: Ability to write in catalogues of all organizations

permissions.name: rg_perm_catalogue_publish_org
permissions.description: Ability to publish catalogues of their organization

permissions.name: rg_perm_catalogue_publish_all
permissions.description: Ability to publish catalogues of all organizations

permissions.name: rg_perm_catalogue_delete_org
permissions.description: Ability to delete catalogues of their organization

permissions.name: rg_perm_catalogue_delete_all
permissions.description: Ability to delete catalogues of all organizations

permissions.name: rg_perm_catalogue_draft_create
permissions.description: Ability to create a catalogue draft

permissions.name: rg_perm_catalogue_draft_audit
permissions.description: Ability to audit a catalogue draft

permissions.name: rg_perm_catalogue_draft_read_all
permissions.description: Ability to view catalogue drafts of all users

permissions.name: rg_perm_catalogue_draft_write_all
permissions.description: Ability to edit catalogue drafts of all users

permissions.name: rg_perm_catalogue_draft_delete_all
permissions.description: Ability to delete catalogue drafts of all users

roles.name: rg_role_org_orchestrator
roles.description: Grant its users the rights to manage all registry features, including the overall supervision of organizations and their members.

roles.name: rg_role_org_validator
roles.description: Grant its users the right to validate records, thus ensuring the quality and consistency of the contents in the registry.

roles.name: rg_role_org_contributor
roles.description: Grant its users the right to submit contributions and proposals for modifications to the registry records.

roles.name: rg_role_org_reader
roles.description: Grant its users read-only access, allowing them to view and search records without being able to modify or validate them.

roles.name: rg_role_user_admin
roles.description: Grant the right to manage everything within their organization, including other users and their roles.

roles.name: rg_role_user_reader
roles.description: Grant read-only access to the registry

roles.name: rg_role_user_contributor
roles.description: Grant the right to submit contributions and proposals for modifications to the registry records.

roles.name: rg_role_user_validator
roles.description: Grant the right to validate records in the registry

roles.name: rg_role_user_orchestrator
roles.description: Grant super admin rights to the registry

organizations.name: Monsstrai Company
organizations.description: Your greatest fears working as one
